about_the_game:
Godhood was a wild game to create. In this artbook you'll find secrets of our development as well as never shown artwork. From character art to environment art, from concept to illustration, you'll find it all going through the 50 pages of visuals. The accompanying texts will give you an insight into our ambitions and ideas.

We made this book for the fans in appreciation of the world of Godhood. Enjoy!

  • Size: 50 pages (25 double pages)
  • Format: PDF

LOCATION
You will find the PDF file in the following location:
...\Steam\steamapps\common\Godhood\artbook\
